Sql.query: SELECT * FROM CAM_FORMATOD1B WHERE IND_DEL = :IND_DEL ORDER BY PROYCODI DESC

INSERT INTO CAM_FORMATOD1B ( FORMATOD1BCODI, PROYCODI, NOMBRECARGA, PROPIETARIO, FECHAINGRESO, BARRACONEXION, NIVELTENSION, USU_CREACION, FEC_CREACION, IND_DEL ) VALUES ( :FORMATOD1BCODI, :PROYCODI, :NOMBRECARGA, :PROPIETARIO, :FECHAINGRESO, :BARRACONEXION, :NIVELTENSION, :USU_CREACION, :FEC_CREACION, :IND_DEL )

UPDATE CAM_FORMATOD1B SET PROYCODI = :PROYCODI, NOMBRECARGA = :NOMBRECARGA, PROPIETARIO = :PROPIETARIO, FECHAINGRESO = :FECHAINGRESO, BARRACONEXION = :BARRACONEXION, NIVELTENSION = :NIVELTENSION, USU_MODIFICACION = :USU_MODIFICACION, FEC_MODIFICACION = :FEC_MODIFICACION WHERE FORMATOD1BCODI = :FORMATOD1BCODI
SELECT * FROM CAM_FORMATOD1B ORDER BY FORMATOD1BCODI DESC FETCH FIRST 1 ROWS ONLY
UPDATE CAM_FORMATOD1B SET IND_DEL = :IND_DEL, USU_MODIFICACION = :USU_MODIFICACION, FEC_MODIFICACION = :FEC_MODIFICACION WHERE PROYCODI = :PROYCODI AND IND_DEL = 0
SELECT * FROM CAM_FORMATOD1B WHERE PROYCODI = :PROYCODI AND IND_DEL = :IND_DEL
